sources.title: Breaking the Ice
sources.description: A young Amish boy runs away from home after he is accused of stealing money from his uncle.

sources.title: Breaking the Ice
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Breaking the Ice (1938) BOBBY BREEN
sources.description:
Stars: Bobby Breen, Charles Ruggles, Dolores Costello 
 Director: Edward F. Cline

 A boy leaves home to Philadelphia and sings at an ice rink to raise money for his widowed mother. Watch for Irene Dare.

metadata.Plot: Tommy Martin lives with mother Martha in a conservative religious community but dreams of a singing career. He leaves to join a traveling show where he befriends skating sensation Irene and performs lively tunes to make a living.
metadata.Writer: Mary C. McCall Jr., Manuel Seff, Bernard Schubert
metadata.Actors: Bobby Breen, Charles Ruggles, Dolores Costello
